bibl.title: The Archaeology of the Meroitic State. New Perspectives on Its Social and Political Organisation. (BAR International Series. 640 = Cambridge Monographs in African Archaeology. 38.)
bibl.note: From the third century BC to the fourth century AD.
EDWARDS David N., The Archaeology of the Meroitic State. New Perspectives on Its Social and Political Organisation. (BAR International Series. 640 = Cambridge Monographs in African Archaeology. 38.)
Oxford, Tempus Reparatum, 1996, 4°, v-136 pp., 5 tabl., 38 figg. ISBN 0-86054-835-2. £23.
